column4: hello i have a little bit of a problem whit ubuntu hardy heron
ok, i have installed hardy heron then i installed the ubuntu-desktop it works fine but i cant play any song i have a intel mother board 945pvs
i instaled hardy heron server (LTS)  then apt-get install ubuntu-desktop and my sond doesnt work :)
yes it's sayng that i have the latest version
Try installing linux-generic (the generic kernel) and switching to it (instead of the server kernel)
Why do you need the server one?
I don't think the server kernel would be required for those
the server kernel won't help you do that.  Try switching to generic, see if it helps.
No, it means you should try the generic kernel.  server kernel has a lot of hardware that it never expects to interface with removed so it can run better
Just knowing whether the generic kernel works will help answer that question.
The kernel has *absolutely* nothing to do with that.  You won't learn linux faster/better with the server kernel, nor does the generic kernel require you to have a pretty desktop
But it very likely would require you to recompile
